name: Lord of the Dark Castle
description: Lord of the Dark Castle is a casual turn-based retro style roguelike dungeon crawler with elements of strategy. Randomized levels, lots of skills without dependencies and lots of spells to cast. Challenging Monster AI - play it smart or die. Remember: Death is Permanent!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/ Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: JRE is bundled with the game. Steam Achievements only supported for 64 bit systems.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: JRE is bundled with the game. Steam Achievements only supported for 64 bit systems.

reviews.review_text: It's a nice little roughlike game, looks indie to the core, I have been playing this one during breaks at office or at home, mostly because I haven't still manage to beat it yet, the allure of beating this keep me going I hope not for too long. Previous to this I have only text rouge game on linux so I feel I am playing prettymuch the same game except theya re more descriptive, I feel the UI could ahve been sorted a bit, to much culor and single font/shape makes it harder to gather information fast.
